name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 029
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, The Hen Hacker Is On The Loose. Someone has exploited Hen's smart contracts and is stealing peoples assets that are listed for swap. Hen is hoping to set up a new set of smart contracts during July but in the meantime anyone with assets listed is a target. I however live on the wild side, try to stop me from minting!
